ModMetaData.name: Stabilized Mechanites - Remastered
ModMetaData.author: Sir Van / Ythern / XxHyde840xX
ModMetaData.description:
Stabilized mechanites adds 2 drugs which are only obtainable via traders or quest rewards, giving you a lesser permanent bonus based on the well known diseases fibrous and sensory mechanites. This is a feature that was intended for a bigger picture, but that I decided to make as a standalone "light version." Art and concept by Sir Van, code by Ythern.
